keyword: how many calories in red bull
title: How Many Calories in Red Bull?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in Red Bull with a full nutrition breakdown for a standard 250 ml can, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for variants.
h1: How Many Calories in Red Bull?
assumptions: Standard 8.4 oz (250 ml) can of original Red Bull energy drink; values based on typical formulation without added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, region, and formulation changes. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 250 ml can of Red Bull contains about 110 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard Red Bull can?
What are the carbs and sugars in Red Bull?
faqs.a: 28 g total carbs, all from 27 g sugars; no fiber.

faqs.q: Does Red Bull have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's mostly sugars and caffeine.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Red Bull?
Are there zero-calorie Red Bull options?
faqs.a: Yes, sugar-free versions have 0 kcal but similar caffeine and sodium.
